item.title: CVE-2024-34801|2024-06-03T10:32:00.529Z -- Mervin Praison -- Praison SEO WordPress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Mervin Praison Praison SEO WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Praison SEO WordPress: from n/a through 4.0.15.
